queue.tweet: Next week: U.S. markets focus on the Fed's Sep 16–17 meeting, with a 25bp cut priced in and the dot plot watched. Also, five S&P 500 firms are due to report Sep 15–21, keeping earnings momentum in play.
queue.summary:
The Fed meeting on Sep 16–17 is the marquee event, with markets expecting a 25 basis-point cut and close scrutiny of the dot plot. Investors will parse the central bank’s projections for inflation and growth. Earnings from several S&P 500 names will shape risk sentiment through the week.

Look for guidance tone and any shifts in forward guidance to drive post-meeting moves. Market reactions could hinge on how the Fed frames the path of policy and how earnings tracks with expectations.
